about_the_game:
About this game:

I'm at school but, since I have the attention span of a goldfish, I cannot help it, I have to use my phone!

Welcome to Phones not allowed!
A Clicker/Survival hybrid game that will allow you to collect and interact with awesome anime artworks in a very sneaky way!



- Interact with super cute anime artworks, add likes and comments just like you would do in a real social media!

- Avoid dangers like your classmates harassing you, be mindful of quick time events and your surroundings!

- We watchful of your teacher! She will always be on the lookout, if you get caught you will get suspended!

- Unlock unique abilities that will help you stay undetected!

Features:

- 30 original Anime artworks to collect
- Multiple characters to interact with (teacher, classmates, janitor and school assistant
- Be careful of sounds! They will provide precious hints and warns you about dangers
- A unique progression system featuring unique abilities
